WorkflowInfo.Name: Servers restart procedure
WorkflowInfo.Description: Restart servers according to a pre defined list
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of servers from an Excel file or a memory table and checks if the server is up or down, and at the end of the process a report is sent to Admin. In case the server is up a restart process is performed. Use this process to maintain a weekly / monthly restart procedure to maintain the servers’ health.
